column5: Description

1. Actively listen and respond to others
2. Ability to communicate and discuss in English
Open to providing and receiving feedback
Present to the team on topics
Clearly write out documentation and written responses
Facilitate open discussions

1. Pair with team members on completing tasks
2. Collaborate with the team and share ideas
Resolve any conflicts in a collaborative manner
Mentoring other team members

1. Consider all perspectives before making a decision
2. Study similar problems to find solutions
3. Reach out to larger team to find solutions
4. Ask the right questions to deep-dive
Analyze potential solutions before implementation

1. Clearly articulate why a decision is being made
2. Support their decision with context
Encourage other team members to progress
Inspire other team members to grow
Share new ideas with others to empower learning
Ability to understand the perspective of others
Respect for team members and clients as equal
Patience and acceptance when working with different levels
Self-aware and mindful of interactions with others

1. Find new skills to improve on and develop
2. Learn from mistakes and use it for future development
Be open to vulnerability and uncertainty
Delegate work to suitable team members

1. Organize team processes and systems
2. Plan and analyze to set project goals
3. Set clear goals for teammates and review progress
Praise achievements and recognize the effort
